languages.text: Каждое действие Лорд-капитана, будь то наклон головы, взмах рукой или шаг в сторону, дефективные единицы повторяли без задержки и тени сомнения, словно чудовищные марионетки, управляемые невидимым кукловодом. Чуть менее минуты мы наблюдали за этой пантомимой в гнетущей растерянности, пока, наконец, сервиторы не замерли. Не видя с их стороны угрозы, Вольный Торговец уверенно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к ним.

traits.locale_text: Каждое действие Лорд-капитана, будь то наклон головы, взмах рукой или шаг в сторону, дефективные единицы повторяли без задержки и тени сомнения, словно чудовищные марионетки, управляемые невидимым кукловодом. Чуть менее минуты мы наблюдали за этой пантомимой в гнетущей растерянности, пока, наконец, сервиторы не замерли. Не видя с их стороны угрозы, Вольный Торговец уверенно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к ним.

languages.text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.
languages.original_text: Каждое действие Лорд-капитана, будь то наклон головы, взмах рукой или шаг в сторону, дефективные единицы повторяли без задержки и тени сомнения, словно чудовищные марионетки, управляемые невидимым кукловодом. Чуть менее минуты мы наблюдали за этой пантомимой в гнетущей растерянности, пока, наконец, сервиторы не замерли. Не видя с их стороны угрозы, Вольный Торговец уверенно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к ним.

traits.locale_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in oppressive perplexity for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in oppressive perplexity for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンがどのような行動をとったとしても、それが頭を傾けたり、手を振ったり、または横に歩くことであっても、不良ユニットたちは、一瞬の遅れもなくそれを繰り返した。それはまるで、見えざる人形遣いによって操られる異形のマリオネットのようであった。我々は驚きと困惑の中、 最終的にサーヴィターたちが停止するまでの 約1分間、これを観察した。彼らからの脅威を感じないため、自由開拓者は何の心配もなく近づいた。
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンがどのような行動をとったとしても、それが頭を傾けたり、手を振ったり、または横に歩くことであっても、不良ユニットたちは、一瞬の遅れもなくそれを繰り返した。それはまるで、見えざる人形遣いによって操られる異形のマリオネットのようであった。我々は驚きと困惑の中、 最終的にサーヴィターたちが停止するまでの 約1分間、これを観察した。彼らからの脅威を感じないため、自由開拓者は何の心配もなく近づいた。

languages.text: Quoi que faisait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} – un hochement de tête, un signe de la main ou un pas de côté –, les unités défectueuses l'imitaient dans l'instant, sans la moindre hésitation, tels des pantins grotesques contrôlés par un mystérieux marionnettiste. Nous observâmes ce numéro de mime, perplexes et inquiets, pendant près d'une minute, après quoi les servitors s'immobilisèrent enfin. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande}, qui ne se sentait nullement {mf|menacé|menacée} par ces unités, s'approcha d'elles avec confiance.
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: Quoi que faisait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} – un hochement de tête, un signe de la main ou un pas de côté –, les unités défectueuses l'imitaient dans l'instant, sans la moindre hésitation, tels des pantins grotesques contrôlés par un mystérieux marionnettiste. Nous observâmes ce numéro de mime, perplexes et inquiets, pendant près d'une minute, après quoi les servitors s'immobilisèrent enfin. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande}, qui ne se sentait nullement {mf|menacé|menacée} par ces unités, s'approcha d'elles avec confiance.

languages.text: 接下来，无论舰长大人做什么，无论是歪头、挥手还是侧身，那些出了故障的机仆都毫不迟疑地重复这些动作，就好像一群怪异的木偶被看不见的细线操纵着一样。我们在苦恼与困惑之中足足观察了近一分钟，到了最后，那些机仆终于停了下来。行商浪人感觉那些机仆并没有威胁的意图，于是满怀信心地靠近了他们。
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: 接下来，无论舰长大人做什么，无论是歪头、挥手还是侧身，那些出了故障的奴工都毫不迟疑地重复这些动作，就好像一群怪异的木偶被看不见的细线操纵着一样。我们在苦恼与困惑之中足足观察了近一分钟，到了最后，那些奴工终于停了下来。行商浪人感觉那些奴工并没有威胁的意图，于是满怀信心地靠近了他们。

languages.text: Hiciera lo que hiciera {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ya fuera una inclinación de cabeza, un gesto de mano o un paso a un lado, las unidades defectuosas lo repetían sin un instante de retraso ni duda, como si fueran las marionetas grotescas de un titiritero invisible. Observamos esta mímica con una estupefacción inquieta durante casi un minuto hasta que los servidores por fin se quedaron quietos. Al no percibir ninguna amenaza, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se aproximó a ellos con confianza.
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: Hiciera lo que hiciera {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ya fuera una inclinación de cabeza, un gesto de mano o un paso a un lado, las unidades defectuosas lo repetían sin un instante de retraso ni duda, como si fueran las marionetas grotescas de un titiritero invisible. Observamos esta mímica con una estupefacción inquieta durante casi un minuto hasta que los servidores por fin se quedaron quietos. Al no percibir ninguna amenaza, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se aproximó a ellos con confianza.

languages.text: Was auch immer der Lord Captain tat, ob es nun eine leichte Neigung des Kopfs war, ein Winken mit der Hand, ein Schritt zur Seite: Die fehlerhaften Einheiten wiederholten jede Bewegung ohne Verzögerung, wie groteske Marionetten, die von einem unsichtbaren Puppenspieler kontrolliert wurden. Wir beobachteten dieses Pantomimenspiel fast eine Minute lang voller Unbehagen und Erstaunen, bis die Servitoren schließlich zum Stillstand kamen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} spürte keine Gefahr von ihnen ausgehen und näherte sich ihnen selbstbewusst.
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: Was auch immer der Lord Captain tat, ob es nun eine leichte Neigung des Kopfs war, ein Winken mit der Hand, ein Schritt zur Seite: Die fehlerhaften Einheiten wiederholten jede Bewegung ohne Verzögerung, wie groteske Marionetten, die von einem unsichtbaren Puppenspieler kontrolliert wurden. Wir beobachteten dieses Pantomimenspiel fast eine Minute lang voller Unbehagen und Erstaunen, bis die Servitoren schließlich zum Stillstand kamen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} spürte keine Gefahr von ihnen ausgehen und näherte sich ihnen selbstbewusst.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan başını da eğse, elini de sallasa, yana bir adım da atsa defolu birimler, en ufak tereddüt göstermeksizin bu hareketleri taklit ediyordu. Âdeta görünmez bir kuklacının oynattığı grotesk kuklalar gibiydiler. Biz bir dakika kadar bu gösteriyi huzursuzluk ve şaşkınlık içinde izledikten sonra nihayetinde durdular. Hür Tacir bir tehlike sezmemiş olacak ki öz güvenle onlara yaklaştı.
languages.original_text: Whatever the Lord Captain did, be it an incline of the head, a wave of a hand, or a step to the side, the defective units repeated it without a moment's delay or hesitation, like grotesque marionettes controlled by an unseen puppeteer. We observed this mime unfold in distressed bafflement for nearly a minute until the servitors finally came to a stop. Not sensing any threat from them, the Rogue Trader approached with confidence.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan başını da eğse, elini de sallasa, yana bir adım da atsa defolu birimler en ufak tereddüt göstermeksizin bu hareketleri taklit ediyordu. Âdeta görünmez bir kuklacının oynattığı grotesk kuklaları andırıyorlardı. Biz bir dakika kadar bu gösteriyi huzursuzluk ve şaşkınlık içinde izledikten sonra nihayetinde hizmetörler durdu. Hür Tacir bir tehlike sezmemiş olacak ki öz güvenle onlara yaklaştı.
